td.content: s:a 55 YO white M butcher presents with Neurological for 6 weeks. he denies smoking describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in his past o:Height 187 cm, Weight 103.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.
